QueryViewSpec.Name: RGL Recurring Gift Activity Backup Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: RGL Revenue Backup used to view Revenue items changed in Phase I of the RGL process
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select rgabackup.SOURCEREVENUEID as ID, rgabackup.PAYMENTREVENUEID, case when ft.DELETEDON is null then ft.CALCULATEDUSERDEFINEDID else null end as PAYMENTREVENUELOOKUPID, ft.DATE as PAYMENTDATE, ftli.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT as PAYMENTAMOUNT, rgabackup.DATECHANGED from dbo.USR_RGLBACKUP_RECURRINGGIFTACTIVITY rgabackup join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONLINEITEM ftli on rgabackup.PAYMENTREVENUEID = ftli.ID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ftli.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID = ft.ID
